description:
Upgrade your EDC with these compact tools. This combo bundles the Paraframe pocketknife with the TSA friendly Mullet keychain tool, giving you a pair of EDC-worthy tools. This is a special bundle for holidays, so snag one while you can.

  • 420HC blade is easy to sharpen and holds an edge well
  • Framelock provides a solid lock that helps keeps you safe
  • Slim skeletonized handle is lightweight and carries well
  • The Paraframe’s Pocket clip is set up for right-handed tip-down carry
  • The Mullet Shard has 9 tools integrated into its compact design: pry bar, small and large flat head screwdriver, small Philips screwdriver, wire strippers, nail puller, scraper, ¼in. hex driver, and a bottle opener
  • The Mullet is TSA friendly (the Paraframe is not!)
name: Gerber Paraframe I Knife+ Mullet Tool 2-Piece Set - Unisex
